thread.title: Cynthia Perkins
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Cynthia Perkins

author: Cynthia Perkins
title: Cynthia Perkins
text: Staff is friendly and pleasant. They give full attention to detail, caught an error on my mileage records which could have affected the warranty on my tires. I came in when they opened, no reservation and was out in less than an hour. Sometimes waits mid to late day can be up to two hours, but that is because they are busy and do a first rate job. To me this means they are doing business right. Highly recommended, I would not go anywhere else.
